includedAssets.title: Rise
includedAssets.synopsis: Beckett faces a long road to recovery after the shooting, while the precinct gets a new captain, Victoria 'Iron' Gates (Penny Johnson Jerald).

includedAssets.title: Heroes & Villains
includedAssets.synopsis: When an ex-con is mysteriously murdered in the process of reoffending, the team begin a hunt for a costume-wearing vigilante.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Castle hunts for Beckett’s sniper, while his future with the precinct is made uncertain by the arrival of a new captain. Nathan Fillion returns as the unpredictable author-turned-detective in this fourth season.

includedIn.title: Castle
includedIn.synopsis: After he is asked to help investigate real-life murders copied from his best-selling series, author Rick Castle shadows the NYPD’s Detective Kate Beckett as research for his next book.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Author Rick Castle is asked to help investigate murders copied from his best-selling series, then stays with the precinct to research his next book.
